name: Healing Waters
description:
HEALING WATERS is a game we created during  the 11th to the 14th of January with Chris Wratt. The game is loosely based on the zine aspect of the publication Two Sides of the Same Coin (produced by E-Kare) and has music written by GJvB. A big thank U to Chris, the bitsy game engine and HTML for the opportunity!

check out the rest of the publication here : https://e-kare.bandcamp.com/album/two-sides-of-the-same-coin

Two Sides of the Same Coin is a publication produced by E-Kare, as part of the Open Studios Project 2018 / 2019 hosted by The Arts Village.
